definitions: the making of a long, high-pitched cry or sound

examples.text: dogs may exhibit signs of anxiety, such as whining, chewing, and excessive barking

shortDefinitions: making of a long, high-pitched cry or sound

definitions: the action of complaining in a feeble or petulant way

examples.text: the constant whining of his greedy, spoiled cousin

shortDefinitions: action of complaining in feeble or petulant way

definitions: making or characterized by a long, high-pitched cry or sound
shortDefinitions: making or characterized by long, high-pitched complaining cry or sound

definitions: complaining in a feeble or petulant way

examples.text: he wrote a whining letter proclaiming that he was in an intolerable position

shortDefinitions: complaining in feeble or petulant way
